text: Grid Network previously known as Gramedia Majalah (Gramedia Magazine) is an Indonesian company, and as a part o Kompas Gramedia Group. Contains: news, lifestyle, and entertainment to tens of million readers in Indonesia. And also Grid Network brings back comic publishing, such as m&c;! Comics and Elex Media Komputindo it has previously as a part of Gramedia Publishers. == Other websites == Official Website of Grid Network Category:Companies of Indonesia
title: Grid Network (company)
